column4: Anyone having problems with Pidgin not allowing you to create new a new "buddy group" using the AIM service??
can't you just create a new group, then add people to it?
No. It lets me choose Create/Add Group...then assign a name..but the Group never appears
Even if I log into my AIM 6.0 on my WinXP Partition and add a group then relog-in using Pidgin the new group never propogates to Pidgin's list
